servers.name: Singapore LTA
servers.description: Facilitates real-time access to Singapore's Land Transport Authority (LTA) transportation data, offering insights into bus arrivals, train services, traffic conditions, and more through integration with the LTA DataMall API.
features: Get current bus arrival times by bus stop ID
Retrieve traffic incidents and road closures
Find parking availability in public car parks
Get estimated travel times on expressways

servers.name: US National Park Service
servers.description: Facilitates retrieval of National Park Services data using the NPS API, allowing users to list national parks by state and access detailed information about specific parks.
features: List all national parks in the US
Filter parks by state or region
Get detailed information about specific parks
Check park facilities and visitor centers

servers.name: US Weather Service
servers.description: Provides comprehensive weather data for US locations through integration with the National Weather Service API.

categories.name: Transportation
categories.description: Servers providing transportation-related data like public transit, traffic, and travel planning.

categories.name: Government
categories.description: Servers providing access to government data, services, and information resources.

categories.name: Weather
categories.description: Servers providing weather data, forecasts, and alerts for various locations.
